groups.name: nbi.mns
groups.description: Configuration properties for 3GPP NBI MnS API.

properties.name: nbi.mns.fault-mns-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable Fault Management Service API.

properties.name: nbi.mns.perf-mns-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable Performance Management Service API.

properties.name: nbi.mns.base-path
properties.description: Base path for API endpoints (if using a custom context path).
